thread.title: Renee Li
thread.title_full: Otticanet recensione scritta da Renee Li

author: Renee Li
title: Renee Li
text: I have no complaints about my purchase from Otticanet. My sunglasses did get held up at Customs for an extra day (into the US) but they released their hold quickly. My sunglasses are authentic and I got them for a lot cheaper and with no sales tax! Would definitely recommend using Otticanet to anyone looking for a reputable company to order sunglasses online from.
